data.title: Deep Data 2013 Supplementary Spreadsheet
data.meta_description: Deep Data 2013 Supplementary Spreadsheet - Free ebook download as Excel Spreadsheet (.xls / .xlsx), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read book online for free. The document discusses a study on B-to-B prospecting databases conducted by Bernice Grossman and Ruth P. Stevens. It contains submissions from seven data vendors detailing the data fields they offer on corporate records and their views on the most predictive fields for marketing results. Key fields included executive title, industry, employee size, sales volume and Fortune rankings. Location type and indicators for small businesses or e-commerce also showed unexpected predictive ability.
